questions.question: How long does it take to see SEO results?
questions.answer: Most clients see initial improvements in 3-6 months, with significant results typically occurring within 6-12 months. SEO is a long-term strategy that compounds over time.

questions.question: Do you guarantee first page rankings?
questions.answer: We don't guarantee specific rankings as search engines constantly evolve. However, we do guarantee improved visibility, traffic, and performance using proven SEO strategies.

questions.question: What's included in your SEO audit?
questions.answer: Our comprehensive audit covers technical SEO, on-page optimization, content analysis, site speed, mobile usability, and competitive analysis. You'll receive a detailed report with actionable recommendations.

questions.question: Do you only work with Canadian businesses?
questions.answer: While we specialize in the Canadian market, we work with businesses across North America. Our local SEO expertise is particularly valuable for Canadian companies.

cta.title: Ready to Dominate Search Results?
